discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
on a report click on the dropdown by 'Edit' button and select 'Export'. 
You will see two options for export now, 'Formatted Excel' and 'Details Only'. *
Formatted Excel is the new version of printable view.
A report once created needs to be run at least one time
in edit mode, you can not export. I did not see print even after running.

comments.content: No we dont have to run the report to view dropdown items
You have to run the report to view drop down items.

discussion.content: not sure about this answer... Printable view and export is available from drop down, in report search results list, next to report name - I do not have to run report to export

questions.question_text: You must run the report before you can print or export it because the Printable View and Export details buttons are not available in the report builder.

questions.question_text: Which Salesforce editions provide option for customizing profiles?
How many profiles can load in a single list view with Enhanced Profile Management enabled?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.users_inline_editing.htm&type=5
=> If enhanced profile list views are enabled for your organization, you can change permissions in up to 200 profiles directly from the list view, without accessing individual profile pages.

questions.question_text: Which is a capability of the new Service Cloud console?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ABC
The correct answers are:

A. It provides data visibility by combining a list view and related records on one screen.
B. It allows agents to view key record information in the highlights panel.
C. It preserves the context of calls using primary tabs and subtabs.
E. It allows agents to take notes in an interaction log while in a call.

Explanation:

 • A: The Service Cloud Console allows agents to see a list view and related records on the same screen, improving data visibility and reducing navigation.
 • B: The Highlights Panel provides key record details in a concise format, helping agents quickly access important information.
 • C: Primary tabs and subtabs are used to maintain context, letting agents work on multiple records or cases within a single interface.
 • E: The Interaction Log allows agents to take notes during a call or interaction directly in the console.
Why not C? Tabs and subtabs make what console style is.
Please mention how many answers are expected.

choices.D: It allows access to data by opening each record in a new window.
choices.C: It preserves the context of calls using primary tabs and subtabs.
choices.A: It provides data visibility by combining a list view and related records on one screen.
choices.E: It allows agents to take notes in an interaction log while in a call.
choices.B: It allows agents to view key record information in the highlights panel.

questions.question_text: User A modifies a record. This modification triggers a workflow rule for immediate execution that includes a field update on the current record. After the execution is complete, what user will be listed under the Last Modified field of this record?

choices.D: The last user to modify the record prior to User A
